example.eg: You will need to prove your identity before you cash the cheque.
example.egtrans: 在您将支票兑成现金之前，您需要证明自己的身份。

example.eg: He was questioning his own identity.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 个性，个人特质, 自我，自身, 身份

example.eg: Each plant has an identity of its own.  The Venus de Milo has kept its unique identity, despite the loss of its arms.
example.egtrans: 每株植物都有自己的特性。米洛的维纳斯尽管失去了双臂，却保留了自己独有的特色。

example.eg: The identity of their facial features is quite remarkable.
I need to remember these identities for the trigonometry test.
Fictional user-names allow us to maintain a concealed identity.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 隐藏身份, 隐藏特征

example.eg: They were trying to change their corporate identity by using a new logo and advertisements.
You'll need to show your ID card to get in.
The British government is planning to introduce identity cards for all citizens.
The country is going through an identity crisis shaped by significant demographic changes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 身份危机，对自我身份的怀疑与困惑, 身份危机，青春期的心理迷惘

example.eg: Mary was a victim of identity theft; someone else was using her name and date of birth illegally.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 身份盗窃, 身份盗用

example.eg: He was taken into custody for a case of mistaken identity.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 秘密身份, 真实身份
